page.title: 10MEADOW FARM
page.content:
Mrs. Atkins has farmed Meadow Farm in the Soar Valley for the last 9 years. She has 36 acres of grassland which floods sometimes. She keeps 13 Fresian/Hereford bullocks and 1 Charolet raised for beef at 2 years old. She uses Leicester and Melton Markets. She has 8 horses and one is awaiting a foal. The farmhouse is 40 years old. Quorn By-Pass is scheduled to cut through her land. She is objecting to the plan. She will be finished if that happens. She has 9 machines - tractors, a bailer, a mower and muck-spreader. She uses 1000 bales of hay each year to feed the animals.
CLASS THREE.
